case_title: GOVERNMENT OF BALOCHISTAN through Chief Secretary, Services & GAD, Quetta vs GOVERNMENT OF BALOCHISTAN
appellant: GOVERNMENT OF BALOCHISTAN through Chief Secretary, Services & GAD, Quetta

facts.location: Fatimah Jinnah General and Chest Hospital, Quetta
facts.allegation: Embezzlement of Rs. 17,15,000 due to lack of financial, administrative, and internal control

initial_inquiry.conducted_by: Muhammad Younas Mandokhel (Chairman, Chief Minister's Inspection Team)
initial_inquiry.findings: Negligence attributed to accused; penalties suggested

review_petition.outcome: Findings set aside; fresh show-cause notices issued

findings.others: Negligence attributed to appellant and other officials

penalties.recovery: Rs. 4,69,894.50 as arrears of land revenue

tribunal_findings.discrimination: Doctors exonerated while appellant penalized on similar evidence

decision.order: Impugned order set aside; fresh inquiry directed within four months
